verses.text: \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beeri|strong="H0882"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* start \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, Go, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* loose ways, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* same, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H0776"\w* untrue \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* wife \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Diblaim, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, Give \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w time|strong="H5750"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* send \w punishment|strong="H6485"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* line \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H6485"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* end \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H3205"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* forgiveness.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3467"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fighting \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

Now \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* been taken \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* breast, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* woman \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Lo-ammi|strong="H3818"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*.

But still the number of the children of Israel will be like the sand of the sea, which may not be measured or numbered; and in place of its being said to them, You are not my people, it will be said to them, You are the sons of the living God
And the children of Israel and the children of Judah will come together and take for themselves one head, and will go up from the land, for great will be the day of Jezreel.
